video.title: The Great War Diary
video.synopsis: Based on the accounts of 14 soldiers and civilians who endured World War I, this docudrama illuminates everyday life during the Great War.

episodes.synopsis: Forty years of complex political strife come to a head in 1914, when the assassination of an Austrian royal propels Europe into a massive war.
episodes.title: The Abyss

episodes.synopsis: As the conflict in Europe spreads to the rest of the world, 20 million men join the fighting, and immense casualties are caused by modern weapons.
episodes.title: The Onslaught

episodes.synopsis: The naive beginnings of the Great War have been replaced by agonized daily reality, and every nation desperately calls for medical professionals.
episodes.title: The Anguish

episodes.synopsis: While the men in the trenches are living under brutal conditions, the women they have left behind must carry on despite uncertainty and deprivation.
episodes.title: The Heart's Desire

episodes.synopsis: By 1916, the machinery of war has caused unprecedented levels of destruction, but world leaders refuse to consider any peace agreements.
episodes.title: The Annihilation

episodes.synopsis: On the home front, women, children and the elderly work hard to support the soldiers at the front and survive the threat of encroaching hostilities.
episodes.title: The Home Front

episodes.synopsis: In 1917, citizens and soldiers across Europe and Russia grow tired of the endless strife and rebel by going on strike and refusing to obey orders.
episodes.title: The Uprising

episodes.synopsis: After the United States enters the war, the Allies launch a counteroffensive that finally threatens to break the might of the exhausted German forces.
episodes.title: The Tipping Point
